headline.print_headline: Canada Security Services Struggle With Extremist Threat, Resources Gap
headline.main: Canada Security Services Struggle With Extremist Threat, Resources Gap

lead_paragraph: Canada's spy agency and national police force are so constrained by a lack of resources that they can’t keep close track of all the Islamic extremists who may be a potential threat at home and they have also had to abandon some counter-espionage work and criminal investigations, according to current and former intelligence and police officials.
